  • Method Details

    • loadStructureTypesFromDirectory

      public List<StructureType> loadStructureTypesFromDirectory()
      Attempts to load and register all jars in the default directory, which is the base plugin directory + Constants.ANIMATE_ARCHITECTURE_EXTENSIONS_FOLDER_NAME.

      See also loadStructureTypesFromDirectory(Path).

    • loadStructureTypesFromDirectory

      public List<StructureType> loadStructureTypesFromDirectory(Path directory)
      Attempts to load and register all jars in a given directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - The directory.
      Returns:
      The list of StructureTypes that were loaded successfully.
